name: Three-Act Structure
description: Classic three-act storytelling structure with setup, confrontation, and resolution

act1_setup.name: Act 1: Setup
act1_setup.description: Introduce the protagonist, establish the ordinary world, and set up the central conflict

act1_inciting_incident.name: Inciting Incident
act1_inciting_incident.description: The event that disrupts the protagonist's normal life and sets the story in motion

act1_plot_point_1.name: Plot Point 1
act1_plot_point_1.description: The moment when the protagonist commits to the journey and enters Act 2

act2a_rising_action.name: Act 2A: Rising Action
act2a_rising_action.description: The protagonist learns the rules of the new world and faces initial obstacles

act2_midpoint.name: Midpoint
act2_midpoint.description: A major revelation or turning point that changes the protagonist's approach

act2b_obstacles.name: Act 2B: Obstacles
act2b_obstacles.description: The protagonist faces greater challenges as the antagonist closes in

act2_plot_point_2.name: Plot Point 2
act2_plot_point_2.description: The lowest point for the protagonist, leading into the final act

act3_climax.name: Act 3: Climax
act3_climax.description: The final confrontation between protagonist and antagonist

act3_resolution.name: Resolution
act3_resolution.description: The aftermath of the climax and return to a new normal
